amendment.description: Amendment increases funds for United States Coast Guard Operating Expenses by $5.2 million to address search and rescue capabilities in the Great Lakes Region and reduces funds for Coast Guard automated systems by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding in the United States Coast Guard Operating Expenses by $5,200,000 and reduce funding in the Automation Moderization systems account by $5,200,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dold amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
